text: i really like this idea, and I think the video you don’t reference on the homepage explains what’s going on in a way more exciting way than the proof of concept. makes me want to get my hands dirty. i know it’s slower and text-based, but please consider using the same explanation in whatever the follow up intro video you said you were planning!
